page.title: 08STEWARTBY: CHILDRENS VIEWS
page.content: Written by Jackie Daniels age 14. I asked a number of people what they thought of living in Stewartby. Their answers were very much the same. "It's boring" "Can't wait to get out of this dump" were some typical replies. I was inclined to agree with them. Stewartby is boring, and a dump. After I had asked the key question, I asked them why they found it boring? Their answers came back: "There's nothing to do" "The smoke is bad, you can hardly breathe". Again, I agreed with them. The only thing to do was wander the streets or go to the parks. As for the smoke, sometimes it smells so terrible and is so thick that you feel better inside the house. I went on to ask what they would like to be done to Stewartby. They answered:
